availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in 1840. 2nd Regiment Kentucky Cavalry, Captain Company C.

bibl.p: J. H. Battle, W. H. Perrin, & G. C. Kniffin Kentucky: A History of the State (Louisville: Battey Publishing, 1885), 720; "Kentucky Civil War Service Records of Union Soldiers, 1861-1865," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F8FK-3KP : 4 December 2014), Owen Star, 1861; from "Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky," Fold3.com; citing military unit Second Cavalry, S, NARA microfilm publication M397, roll 22, National Archives and Records Administration, Washington, D.C.
